column2: Discard reads below minimum quality threshold
Check of bacterial contamination; discard offending reads
Discard reads with common uncalled characters (e.g. N)
Remove reads from pair-end libraries that were orphaned by filtering steps 1-3
Calculated for each library from BAM files obtained by mapping a random sample (one million reads) of each FASTQ file against transcriptome reference (Ensembl release: 70)
Against genome reference (Ensembl release: 70) tophat1 version: 1.4.1
Obtained from the genes.fpkm_tracking files, then averaged for all biological replicates (if any)
